title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake

content.text: 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies" )

content.text: 0) Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs.
1) Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "crumbs"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "melted margarine"@23:39 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "press"@44:49 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan"@55:92 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-1-1 "pie plate"@96:105 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stand remaining cookies around edge of pan.
3) Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust.
5) Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "soften"@14:20 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "1 quart of ice cream"@21:41 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "microwave"@45:54 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-5-1 "countertop"@61:71 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "spread"@28:34 / AC
		:ppt ( "softened ice cream"@35:53 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "fudge layer"@59:70 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-6-0 "After crust has chilled"@3:26 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Scoop remaining quart of ice cream into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer.
9) Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Freeze"@4:10 / AC
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until firm"@11:21 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "4 hours"@23:30 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-9-1 "overnight"@34:43 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) To serve, garnish with remainder of fudge topping, whipped cream and cherries.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "garnish"@14:21 / AC
		:prp ( purp-10-0 "To serve"@4:12 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "remainder of fudge topping"@27:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "whipped cream"@55:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cherries"@73:81 / FOOD )
	)
)
